Government
Gants Hill is governed by the London Borough of Redbridge. Our families pay rates to the London Borough of Redbridge and this pays for many things we need in the borough. A Councillor is elected for a Ward such as Wanstead and then looks after the interests of all people in that Ward. With Councillors of other Wards in the Borough he must ensure the Council makes Rules for and provides many services. Some are- proper Homes;good roads, lighting and refuse disposal; adequate Social Services - care for the elderly and those in need of help;a good education for all children;control of building and car parking; clean and hygienic shops, and parks to walk and play in.
